Action to Take Upon the Death of a Child
Discontinue
payment of any benefits or share of benefits to a deceased child with
no surviving spouse on the award, effective the first day of the month of death under
38 CFR 3.500(g)(l)
, and
a surviving spouse on the same award, effective the first day of the month after death under
38 CFR 3.500(g)(2)
.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section B - Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) Awards Following Death of a Surviving Spouse or Dependent
